messages.content: ComfyUI_Qwen2-VL-Instruct is an implementation of Qwen2-VL-Instruct by ComfyUI that supports text-based queries, video queries, single-image queries, and multi-image queries to generate captions or responses.
What types of queries can be submitted to ComfyUI_Qwen2-VL-Instruct?
ComfyUI_Qwen2-VL-Instruct supports text-based queries, video queries, single-image queries, and multi-image queries.
How can a user submit a text-based query in ComfyUI_Qwen2-VL-Instruct?
A user can submit a textual query by inputting a description or question, such as 'What is the meaning of life?'
What can ComfyUI_Qwen2-VL-Instruct do with a video query?
When a user uploads a video, ComfyUI_Qwen2-VL-Instruct can analyze the content and generate a detailed caption for each frame or a summary of the entire video.
How does ComfyUI_Qwen2-VL-Instruct handle single-image queries?
For a single-image query, ComfyUI_Qwen2-VL-Instruct can generate a caption describing the content of the individual image.
What is the function of ComfyUI_Qwen2-VL-Instruct in multi-image queries?
For multi-image queries, ComfyUI_Qwen2-VL-Instruct can provide a collective description or a narrative that ties the images together.

ComfyUI_Qwen2-VL-Instruct can be installed from ComfyUI Manager by searching for 'Qwen2' or by downloading or cloning the repository into the 'ComfyUI\custom_nodes\' directory and running 'pip install -r requirements.txt'.
Where are the models for ComfyUI_Qwen2-VL-Instruct downloaded?
The models for ComfyUI_Qwen2-VL-Instruct are downloaded automatically when running the workflow if they are not found in the 'ComfyUI\models\prompt_generator\' directory.
